abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists of: (i)
            rehabilitation on 3 sections of road totalling 36 km; (ii)
            an intensive pavement patching and drainage restoration
            program over 320 km of main roads; (iii) procurement of
            about 22 units of road maintenance equipment; (iv) about 160
            man-months of consultancy services to staff a Project
            Management Unit and provide technical assistance to MCWT for
            engineering and supervision of rehabilitation works,
            preparing and executing a four-year road maintenance
            program, establishing an appropriate cost accounting system,
            coordinating the works in the road program and training in
            road maintenance techniques.
